short_summary: The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) requires a Change Management Consultant to assist in Digital Transformation.
description: The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is seeking a Change Management Consultant to support the agency's Digital Transformation efforts. The consultant will be responsible for communicating changes to stakeholders, providing technical expertise, and ensuring seamless transitions. This is an amendment to the original RFP, which has been modified to change the bid closing date to August 4th, 2023, and to include additional Q&A during the solicitation period. The consultant will work in the metropolitan region of Montr?)al.
full_summary:
### Change Management Support in the Context of Digital Transformation

**Reference Number:** CB-6866-89678658
** Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 9F019-22-0084
**Publication Date:** June 30, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** August 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is issuing a tender for Change Management Support in the Context of Digital Transformation. The requirement is open to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 and have the necessary expertise in change management.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected contractor will provide change management support services to the CSA to ensure a successful digital transformation. The scope of work includes:

* Change Management Planning and Implementation
* Communications and Stakeholder Engagement
* Project Management Support

**Eligible Contractors:**
Only Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have the necessary expertise in change management and are qualified under Tier 1 are eligible to submit a proposal.

**Contact Information:**
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Sophorn Sok
Email: sophorn.sok@asc-csa.gc.ca
Phone: (514) 708-6583

The tender dossier can be downloaded from [Canadabuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6866/9f019-22-0084---rfp_tsps_change-management-support-in-the-context-of-digital-transformation---amendment-1.pdf). The tender closing date is August 4, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. [^1]

[^1]: The deadline has been extended to August 4, 2023, due to the amendment. The previous deadline was August 3, 2023. ^ [^2]

[^2]: The bidder list has been updated to reflect the eligible contractors who have been invited to submit a proposal.

The tender is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the contact.
